FuncDef: This command configures the intercept-id that is inserted into the packet header for all mirrored packets of the associatedli-sourceentry. Thisintercept-idcan be used (for example by a downstream LI gateway) to identify the particular LI session to which the packet belongs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the intercept ID value to insert into the header of the mirrored packets. Values-1 to 4294967295 (32b) For nat li-source entries that are using a mirror service that is not configured with routable encap.

ExtraInfo: Default: no intercept-id (an id of 0, or no id)
